price: Na akatoa mkono wake, mara ukawa mweupe kwa watazamao.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
footnotes: Akautoa mkono wake kutoka mfukoni mwake, na hapo hapo ukawa mweupe safi kabisa ukimeremeta katika macho ya wanao angalia!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
